description.value: The alchemist can expend any prepared extract to produce a cube of glowing motes that act as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.ec2zmvdzi4m3puh4]{Glitterdust}. The area must be adjacent to the alchemist and covers one 5-foot square per level of extract sacrificed, and the effectâ€™s save DC is calculated using the level of the sacrificed extract. The alchemist must have the infusion discovery to choose this discovery.
